mapper.select: select va.id, ai.name apartment_name, gi.name, gi.url, va.appointment_time, va.appointment_status from view_appointment va left join apartment_info ai on va.apartment_id = ai.id left join graph_info gi on ai.id = gi.item_id and gi.item_type=1 where va.is_deleted=0 and gi.is_deleted=0 and va.user_id=#{userId} order by va.create_time desc
